text: “Ndipo iwo akupembedza milungu yina kusiya Allah, yomwe singathe kuwapatsa masautso (ngati atasiya kuipembedza) ndiponso siyingathe kuwapatsa chithandizo (ngati atalimbika kuipembedza) ndipo akunena: “Iwo (mafanowo) ndi aomboli athu kwa Allah.” Nena: “Kodi mukumuuza Allah zomwe sakudziwa kumwamba ndi pansi? Wapatukana Allah Ndipo watukuka kuzimene akum’phatikiza nazo.”
